change.changenote: Sections 1 to 14 were enacted by 2012-19-1 to 14, effective March 2, 2013 [30 days after BC Reg 33/2013 deposited January 31, 2013 (BC Reg 33/2013)].
Section 3 (1) (b) BEFORE amended by 2023-10-188, effective March 30, 2023 (Royal Assent).

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: while performing his or her duties as a firefighter, an emergency medical assistant or a peace officer;

change.changenote: Section 15 was enacted by 2012-19-15[conseq], effective March 2, 2013 [30 days after BC Reg 33/2013 deposited January 31, 2013 (BC Reg 33/2013)].
